BATwinsMod:ParoxysmalPain.NAME: The Pain of Creation
BATwinsMod:ParoxysmalPain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies，Apply !M!  batwinsmod:Burn .

BATwinsMod:PaintingArt.NAME: Painting Art
BATwinsMod:PaintingArt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and Apply 2 poison to a random enemy !M! times.

BATwinsMod:DeveloperCollaboration.NAME: Developer collaboration
BATwinsMod:DeveloperCollaboration.DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:Share . NL After alternating between playing batwinsmod:MomoiCard and batwinsmod:MidoriCard in battle,the damage dealt by the cards this turn and the block of gian increase !M! %.

BATwinsMod:Exchange.NAME: Exchange
BATwinsMod:Exchange.DESCRIPTION: retain . NL batwinsmod:Exchange up to 2 cards in your hand.
BATwinsMod:Exchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: retain . NL batwinsmod:Exchange up to 3 cards in your hand.

BATwinsMod:KeepItToTheEnd.NAME: Deadline
BATwinsMod:KeepItToTheEnd.DESCRIPTION: Discard all batwinsmod:MomoiCard in your hand，Gain !B! Block for each card.

BATwinsMod:ArtPolishing.NAME: Art polishing
BATwinsMod:ArtPolishing.DESCRIPTION: When you apply debuff，Apply !M! poison to same enemy.Will not be triggered by the effect of this power.

BATwinsMod:BattleCommand.NAME: Combat guidance
BATwinsMod:BattleCommand.DESCRIPTION: Choose one card to return to the drawing pile, and add one card of different colors to your hand from the drawing pile.

BATwinsMod:AdditionalAttacks.NAME: Additional attacks
BATwinsMod:AdditionalAttacks.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable . NL When this card in hand and playing other attack cards，Deal !D! Damage to random enemy.

BATwinsMod:AccurateBlocking.NAME: Accurate blocking
BATwinsMod:AccurateBlocking.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! 点 Block . NL If the current Block is less than the attack damage of the selected enemy，Gain !B! 点 Block . NL Only be played when there are no other batwinsmod:MidoriCard in the hand.

BATwinsMod:GameLaunch.NAME: Game Launch
BATwinsMod:GameLaunch.DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:Share , innate . NL Draw !M! cards，random 1 batwinsmod:MomoiCard and random 1 batwinsmod:MidoriCard drawn set cost 0 this turn. NL exhaust
BATwinsMod:GameLaunch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:Share , innate . NL Draw !M! cards，2 random cards drawn this turn have an energy cost of 0. NL exhaust

BATwinsMod:InspirationEmergence.NAME: Inspiration Emerges
BATwinsMod:InspirationEmergence.DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:Share . NL Draw !M! cards， scry 2X and Draw 1 cards.(X is the number of colors of the drawn cards.）

BATwinsMod:PassageInForce.NAME: 强行通过
BATwinsMod:PassageInForce.DESCRIPTION: 对全体敌人Deal !D! Damage，Gain !B! Block，丢弃2cards.

BATwinsMod:SiteAdaptation.NAME: 场地适应
BATwinsMod:SiteAdaptation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! 力量 ， !M! 敏捷 ， !M! 金属化 .

BATwinsMod:OnceMore.NAME: Flame Spreading
BATwinsMod:OnceMore.DESCRIPTION: At the end of our turn, trigger batwinsmod:Burn on all enemies.
BATwinsMod:OnceMore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: innate . NL At the end of our turn, trigger batwinsmod:Burn on all enemies.

BATwinsMod:ExcellentDesigner.NAME: 最棒的开发者们
BATwinsMod:ExcellentDesigner.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 . NL Draw到时Draw !M! cards. NL Deal !D! Damage，Gain !B! Block.在手牌时打出其他牌，在打出前上升那cards基础伤害值和基础Block值.
BATwinsMod:ExcellentDesigner.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw到时Draw !M! cards. NL Deal !D! Damage，Gain !B! Block.在手牌时打出其他牌，在打出前上升那cards基础伤害值和基础Block值.

BATwinsMod:BadDesigner.NAME: 糟糕设计师
BATwinsMod:BadDesigner.DESCRIPTION: 手牌只有时才能打出. NL 在手牌时，打出其他牌时丢弃1cards.再累计打出 !M! 次的话会发生蜕变. exhaust

BATwinsMod:BugCard.NAME: 漏洞
BATwinsMod:BugCard.DESCRIPTION: Draw到时，随机 exhaust 1张其他手牌. exhaust .

BATwinsMod:RushToDraft.NAME: 赶稿
BATwinsMod:RushToDraft.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards.将1张漏洞放入弃牌堆.

BATwinsMod:PlotRepair.NAME: 剧情修补
BATwinsMod:PlotRepair.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage， exhaust Draw牌堆1张漏洞，将1张漏洞放入弃牌堆.
BATwinsMod:PlotRepair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage， exhaust Draw牌堆所有漏洞，将1张漏洞放入弃牌堆.

BATwinsMod:BugFix.NAME: 漏洞修复
BATwinsMod:BugFix.DESCRIPTION: 回合开始时，Draw牌堆随机 !M! 张状态牌或诅咒牌 exhaust .若exhaust的是漏洞，Gain1 力量 和1 敏捷 .

BATwinsMod:AdventureOpening.NAME: 冒险-开幕
BATwinsMod:AdventureOpening.DESCRIPTION: retain NL 打出exhaust的牌.从手牌选择一张冒险牌exhaust.
BATwinsMod:AdventureOpening.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: retain batwinsmod:Share NL 打出exhaust的牌.从手牌选择一张冒险牌exhaust.

BATwinsMod:AdventureBattle.NAME: 冒险-战斗
BATwinsMod:AdventureBattle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage.本回合打出的上一cards如果是冒险牌，伤害翻倍. NL exhaust .

BATwinsMod:LightSpeedStrike.NAME: Lightspeed Strike
BATwinsMod:LightSpeedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If no attack cards were played this turn, choose and play one attack card from your hand. You can only play one more attack card this turn.

BATwinsMod:SinglePlayerGame.NAME: Single-player Game
BATwinsMod:SinglePlayerGame.DESCRIPTION: If there is only one color of cards in your hand after playing a card,Gain !M! Block.

BATwinsMod:CoolingTime.NAME: Cooldown Acceleration
BATwinsMod:CoolingTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.Choose 1 batwinsmod:MidoriCard from the discard pile. It will be added to your hand at the beginning of the next turn unless it is already exhausted.

BATwinsMod:DoubleExperience.NAME: Double Experience
BATwinsMod:DoubleExperience.DESCRIPTION: The batwinsmod:ExperiencePoints gained from playing cards during this battle is doubled.
BATwinsMod:DoubleExperience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:LevelUp 1 . NL The batwinsmod:ExperiencePoints gained from playing cards during this battle is doubled.

BATwinsMod:BDStudy.NAME: BD Study
BATwinsMod:BDStudy.DESCRIPTION: exhaust all batwinsmod:MomoiCard in hand，Gain batwinsmod:ExperiencePoints equal to the total energy cost of exhausted cards, multiplied by !M!. exhaust

BATwinsMod:AbstractSchool.NAME: 像素艺术
BATwinsMod:AbstractSchool.DESCRIPTION: 你的手牌每有1种颜色，Deal !D! Damage，Draw !M! cards.

BATwinsMod:DefensiveCounterattack.NAME: 防守与打击
BATwinsMod:DefensiveCounterattack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.受到攻击后在下个回合开始时对攻击的怪物打出一张打击.

BATwinsMod:AdventureRewards.NAME: 冒险-奖励
BATwinsMod:AdventureRewards.DESCRIPTION: 随机Gain以下1项： NL Gain5 batwinsmod:ExperiencePoints NL 回复3生命 NL Gain [batwinsmod:momoiorbicon] [batwinsmod:midoriorbicon] ,Draw2cards NL exhaust .若上cards是冒险牌，改为随机选择2项.
BATwinsMod:AdventureRewards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 随机Gain以下1项： NL Gain5 batwinsmod:ExperiencePoints NL 回复3生命 NL Gain [batwinsmod:momoiorbicon] [batwinsmod:midoriorbicon] ,Draw2cards NL Gain1随机药水 NL exhaust .若上cards是冒险牌，改为随机选择2项.

BATwinsMod:AccumulatedStrike.NAME: 蓄力打击
BATwinsMod:AccumulatedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage.本场战斗每打出1张打击牌，这cards的伤害上升 !M! .

BATwinsMod:NormalAttackMethods.NAME: 平A流
BATwinsMod:NormalAttackMethods.DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始时，将Draw牌堆随机1张打击牌加入手牌.那cards变为 batwinsmod:Share .
BATwinsMod:NormalAttackMethods.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始时，将Draw牌堆随机1张打击牌加入手牌.那cards变为 batwinsmod:Share . NL Draw牌堆打击牌不足时，将弃牌堆洗入Draw牌堆.

BATwinsMod:AlternatingAttack.NAME: 交替攻击
BATwinsMod:AlternatingAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage.从手牌选择1张 batwinsmod:MidoriCard 打出.

BATwinsMod:TemporaryAssistance.NAME: 暂时援助
BATwinsMod:TemporaryAssistance.DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:Exchange 1张手牌，那cards打出后变回原颜色.这cards在Draw牌堆时，耗尽 [batwinsmod:midoriorbicon] 时加入手牌.
BATwinsMod:TemporaryAssistance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:Exchange 1张手牌，那cards打出后变为原颜色.这cards在Draw牌堆或弃牌堆时，耗尽 [batwinsmod:midoriorbicon] 加入手牌.

BATwinsMod:AdventureExperience.NAME: 冒险-历练
BATwinsMod:AdventureExperience.DESCRIPTION: Gain [batwinsmod:momoiorbicon] [batwinsmod:momoiorbicon] ,Draw !M! cards.本回合打出的上一cards是冒险牌时，Gain [batwinsmod:midoriorbicon] [batwinsmod:midoriorbicon] .
BATwinsMod:AdventureExperience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [batwinsmod:momoiorbicon] [batwinsmod:momoiorbicon] [batwinsmod:momoiorbicon] ,Draw !M! cards.本回合打出的上一cards是冒险牌时，Gain [batwinsmod:midoriorbicon] [batwinsmod:midoriorbicon] .

BATwinsMod:SwitchStrike.NAME: 切换打击
BATwinsMod:SwitchStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL batwinsmod:Synergy ：打出手牌中1张同名的 batwinsmod:MidoriCard .

BATwinsMod:CoverCharge.NAME: 掩护冲锋
BATwinsMod:CoverCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage桃能量次，Gain !B! Block绿能量次.

BATwinsMod:MutualUnderstanding.NAME: 双胞胎默契
BATwinsMod:MutualUnderstanding.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards，若是 batwinsmod:MomoiCard ，将其打出.
BATwinsMod:MutualUnderstanding.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: scry 1.Draw !M! cards，若是 batwinsmod:MomoiCard ，将其打出.

BATwinsMod:MysteriousChest.NAME: 神秘宝箱
BATwinsMod:MysteriousChest.DESCRIPTION: 将1张随机 batwinsmod:MidoriCard 加入手牌，那cardsGain 虚无 ， exhaust ,打出前耗能为0. NL batwinsmod:Exchange 这cards.
BATwinsMod:MysteriousChest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 将1张随机 batwinsmod:MidoriCard 加入手牌，那cardsGain retain ， exhaust ，打出前耗能为0. NL batwinsmod:Exchange 这cards.

BATwinsMod:SeeYouHaveAShare.NAME: 见者有份！
BATwinsMod:SeeYouHaveAShare.DESCRIPTION: 本回合打出的下 !M! 张单体攻击牌会额外对所有敌人打出1次.

BATwinsMod:CheatingCodeEnabled.NAME: 作弊码开启
BATwinsMod:CheatingCodeEnabled.DESCRIPTION: 丢弃手牌所有 batwinsmod:MidoriCard ，Draw batwinsmod:MomoiCard 直到手牌Draw满.将所有 [batwinsmod:midoriorbicon] 转化为 [batwinsmod:momoiorbicon] . exhaust
BATwinsMod:CheatingCodeEnabled.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 丢弃手牌所有 batwinsmod:MidoriCard ，Draw batwinsmod:MomoiCard 直到手牌Draw满.将所有 [batwinsmod:midoriorbicon] 转化为 [batwinsmod:momoiorbicon] .本回合结束时将弃牌堆洗入Draw牌堆. exhaust

BATwinsMod:FundOverdraft.NAME: 资金透支
BATwinsMod:FundOverdraft.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards.每次打出后Draw牌数-1. NL batwinsmod:Synergy ：Draw牌数重置.

BATwinsMod:TakeActionsSeparately.NAME: 分头行动
BATwinsMod:TakeActionsSeparately.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.选择手牌1张 batwinsmod:MomoiCard 打出.

BATwinsMod:RepeatOperation.NAME: 重复操作
BATwinsMod:RepeatOperation.DESCRIPTION: 选择至多 !M! 张非能力手牌，将其 batwinsmod:Exchange 后的复制加入手牌.

BATwinsMod:ConvenientConnectivity.NAME: 便捷连携
BATwinsMod:ConvenientConnectivity.DESCRIPTION: 选择 !M! 张手牌打出. batwinsmod:Synergy ：随机打出Draw牌堆1cards.
BATwinsMod:ConvenientConnectivity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 选择 !M! 张手牌打出. batwinsmod:Synergy ：选择Draw牌堆1cards打出.

BATwinsMod:EndCombo.NAME: 终结连击
BATwinsMod:EndCombo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL batwinsmod:Synergy ：Deal !B! Damage. NL batwinsmod:HyperSynergy ：Deal !M! Damage.

BATwinsMod:ReadingDocuments.NAME: 即时存档
BATwinsMod:ReadingDocuments.DESCRIPTION: 本场战斗被效果打出的牌会回到Draw牌堆.

BATwinsMod:MandatoryInstruction.NAME: 强制连锁
BATwinsMod:MandatoryInstruction.DESCRIPTION: 选择Draw牌堆 !M! 张非能力牌打出，但只会使用其 batwinsmod:Synergy 和 batwinsmod:HyperSynergy 效果.
BATwinsMod:MandatoryInstruction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: retain NL 选择Draw牌堆 !M! 张非能力牌打出，但只会使用其 batwinsmod:Synergy 和 batwinsmod:HyperSynergy 效果.

BATwinsMod:TwoStageAttack.NAME: 二次打击
BATwinsMod:TwoStageAttack.DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:OnlySynergy NL batwinsmod:Synergy ， batwinsmod:HyperSynergy ：对全体敌人Deal !D! Damage2次.

BATwinsMod:TakeABreak.NAME: 暂且休整
BATwinsMod:TakeABreak.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards，这些牌Gain retain . NL batwinsmod:Synergy ：多Draw1cards并选择其中1cards打出.

BATwinsMod:AttackWithAllMight.NAME: 力尽一击
BATwinsMod:AttackWithAllMight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage，这cards本场战斗伤害降低为 !M! %. NL batwinsmod:Synergy ：伤害恢复为100%.

BATwinsMod:DualProtection.NAME: 双重防护
BATwinsMod:DualProtection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block，Draw !M! cards. NL batwinsmod:Synergy ：Gain !B! Block,Draw !M! cards.

BATwinsMod:OperateFreely.NAME: 随意操作
BATwinsMod:OperateFreely.DESCRIPTION: 随机打出Draw牌堆1张 batwinsmod:MomoiCard . NL batwinsmod:Synergy ：改为选择Draw牌堆1张 batwinsmod:MomoiCard 打出.

BATwinsMod:ExperienceGiftPackage.NAME: 经验大礼包
BATwinsMod:ExperienceGiftPackage.DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:Share NL 若拥有的 batwinsmod:ExperiencePoints 和这cards的耗能相同，打出这cards. NL Draw !M! cards,然后这cards本场战斗耗能减1.

BATwinsMod:SelfConnectivity.NAME: 自我连携
BATwinsMod:SelfConnectivity.DESCRIPTION: 复制本场战斗打出的上一张 batwinsmod:MomoiCard 的效果.
BATwinsMod:SelfConnectivity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 复制本场战斗打出的上一cards的效果.

BATwinsMod:SkillCombination.NAME: 技能融合
BATwinsMod:SkillCombination.DESCRIPTION: 选择Draw牌堆1张技能牌 exhaust .将 !M! 张打击加入Draw牌堆，且这些打击 batwinsmod:Storage 选择的那cards. NL exhaust

BATwinsMod:IntegratingAndIntegrating.NAME: 融会贯通
BATwinsMod:IntegratingAndIntegrating.DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:Share NL 打出 batwinsmod:Exchange 后的耗能1以上的牌时将1张原本颜色的那cards加入手牌，并附加 虚无 ， exhaust .

BATwinsMod:EndlessCombo.NAME: 无尽连击
BATwinsMod:EndlessCombo.DESCRIPTION: 对所有敌人Deal !D! Damage.这cards的伤害翻倍打出这cards时的连携数的次数.

BATwinsMod:PlotPrediction.NAME: 剧情编排
BATwinsMod:PlotPrediction.DESCRIPTION: 回合开始时，失去 [batwinsmod:momoiorbicon] ,每回合结束时打出 !M! 张 batwinsmod:MomoiCard.

BATwinsMod:MasterCraftsmanship.NAME: 技艺大师
BATwinsMod:MasterCraftsmanship.DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:Share NL 每回合开始时 batwinsmod:Exchange 至多1cards. NL 且本场战斗进行 batwinsmod:Exchange 的牌 upgrade .
BATwinsMod:MasterCraftsmanship.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: innate ， batwinsmod:Share NL 每回合开始时 batwinsmod:Exchange 至多1cards. NL 且本场战斗进行 batwinsmod:Exchange 的牌 upgrade .

BATwinsMod:PoisonGasBomb.NAME: 毒气炸弹
BATwinsMod:PoisonGasBomb.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M!  poison !M!  batwinsmod:Burn .触发该敌人的 poison .

BATwinsMod:AdventureBegins.NAME: 冒险小队
BATwinsMod:AdventureBegins.DESCRIPTION: 选择一张和所有 batwinsmod:Storage 的牌类型不同的手牌 exhaust 并 batwinsmod:Storage .
BATwinsMod:AdventureBegins.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 可以 选择一张和所有 batwinsmod:Storage 的牌类型不同的手牌 exhaust 并 batwinsmod:Storage .

BATwinsMod:PropCollection.NAME: 道具收集
BATwinsMod:PropCollection.DESCRIPTION: 从Draw牌堆与弃牌堆选择 !M! cards加入手牌. NL 本回合不能再Draw牌.

BATwinsMod:EquipmentUpgrade.NAME: 装备upgrade
BATwinsMod:EquipmentUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: 选择手牌 !M! cards upgrade ，Gain batwinsmod:Share ， retain 且去除 exhaust ， 虚无 . NL exhaust

BATwinsMod:AutomaticDefense.NAME: 自动防御
BATwinsMod:AutomaticDefense.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable . NL 在手牌并打出其他攻击牌时，Gain !B! 点 Block .

BATwinsMod:BenefitReducingMagic.NAME: 大头照
BATwinsMod:BenefitReducingMagic.DESCRIPTION: Apply所有敌人 !M!  weak .去除所有敌人的 Block .

BATwinsMod:BorrowMe.NAME: 借用一下
BATwinsMod:BorrowMe.DESCRIPTION: 本回合所有牌视为 batwinsmod:Share . NL exhaust
BATwinsMod:BorrowMe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 本回合所有牌视为 batwinsmod:Share .

BATwinsMod:MaidForm.NAME: 女仆形态
BATwinsMod:MaidForm.DESCRIPTION: 每回合打出第1cards后打出1张视为相同耗能的加速.
BATwinsMod:MaidForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:Share NL 每回合打出第1cards后打出1张视为相同耗能的加速.

BATwinsMod:Collaboration.NAME: 蓄力
BATwinsMod:Collaboration.DESCRIPTION: 手牌每有1张 batwinsmod:MomoiCard ，对随机敌人Deal !D! Damage.

BATwinsMod:ShiftingAndGhosting.NAME: 移形换影
BATwinsMod:ShiftingAndGhosting.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block， batwinsmod:Exchange Draw牌堆 !M! cards.

BATwinsMod:CheckTheStrategy.NAME: 查询攻略书
BATwinsMod:CheckTheStrategy.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards，丢弃所有非 batwinsmod:MidoriCard Draw等量牌. NL 若此牌没有丢弃牌则从Draw牌堆选择1cards加入手牌.
BATwinsMod:CheckTheStrategy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards，丢弃所有非 batwinsmod:MidoriCard Draw等量牌. NL 若此牌没有丢弃牌则从Draw牌堆选择1cards加入手牌.

BATwinsMod:LeaveItToMe.NAME: 交给我吧
BATwinsMod:LeaveItToMe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL 手牌全是 batwinsmod:MomoiCard 或 batwinsmod:Synergy ：每有1个敌人Gain !B! 点 Block .

BATwinsMod:Assault.NAME: 突袭
BATwinsMod:Assault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage，Apply !M!  weak . NL 本回合未打出牌时，选择手牌1张技能牌打出.

BATwinsMod:DontSayIt.NAME: 要对姐姐保密哦
BATwinsMod:DontSayIt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! 点 Block 2次，丢弃手牌中所有非 batwinsmod:MidoriCard . NL 若此牌没有丢弃牌则 batwinsmod:LevelUp !M! .

BATwinsMod:ItsSoPainful.NAME: 单独进攻
BATwinsMod:ItsSoPainful.DESCRIPTION: Apply !D! Damage !M! 次，丢弃手牌中所有非 batwinsmod:MomoiCard .若此牌没有丢弃牌则本场战斗此牌伤害次数增加1.

BATwinsMod:PenetrationDamage.NAME: 贯通伤害
BATwinsMod:PenetrationDamage.DESCRIPTION: Apply所有敌人 !D! Damage，所有没有Block的敌人失去 !M! 点 力量 . NL exhaust NL batwinsmod:Synergy ：本场战斗不 exhaust .

BATwinsMod:LoginRewards.NAME: 登入奖励
BATwinsMod:LoginRewards.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! batwinsmod:ExperiencePoints . NL batwinsmod:Synergy ：手牌随机1张 batwinsmod:MidoriCard batwinsmod:Storage 1张 登入奖励 （不会重复存储）. exhaust
BATwinsMod:LoginRewards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! batwinsmod:ExperiencePoints . NL batwinsmod:Synergy ：手牌随机1张 batwinsmod:MidoriCard batwinsmod:Storage 1张 登入奖励+ （不会重复存储）. exhaust

BATwinsMod:Learned.NAME: 完美转化
BATwinsMod:Learned.DESCRIPTION: Draw到时选择1张非能力手牌 exhaust 并 batwinsmod:Storage .（只会存储1cards） NL Deal !D! Damage， 斩杀 时 batwinsmod:Storage 的那cards永久 batwinsmod:Exchange 为 batwinsmod:MomoiCard .

BATwinsMod:ForceDetonation.NAME: 强行引爆
BATwinsMod:ForceDetonation.DESCRIPTION: 触发所有敌人的 batwinsmod:Burn 和 poison !M! 次.之后所有敌人的 batwinsmod:Burn 和 poison 数减半.

BATwinsMod:ScriptRewriting.NAME: 剧本改写
BATwinsMod:ScriptRewriting.DESCRIPTION: 将1个敌人的 batwinsmod:Burn 和 poison 的数互换,Gain其差值的 Block . NL exhaust
BATwinsMod:ScriptRewriting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: retain NL 将1个敌人的 batwinsmod:Burn 和 poison 的数互换，Gain其差值的 Block . NL exhaust

BATwinsMod:EasterEgg.NAME: 彩蛋
BATwinsMod:EasterEgg.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL 恭喜你发现了彩蛋.
BATwinsMod:EasterEgg.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL 你居然还upgrade了这个彩蛋.

BATwinsMod:ContinuousShooting.NAME: 连续射击
BATwinsMod:ContinuousShooting.DESCRIPTION: retain ，能被多次 upgrade NL retain 时 batwinsmod:Storage !M! 张随机 batwinsmod:Bullet . 打出后清空 batwinsmod:Storage 的 batwinsmod:Bullet .

BATwinsMod:BreechLoading.NAME: 上膛
BATwinsMod:BreechLoading.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! 点 Block . NL 手牌所有 batwinsmod:Shoot 牌 batwinsmod:Storage !M! 张 随机 batwinsmod:Bullet .
BATwinsMod:BreechLoading.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: retain NL Gain !B! 点 Block . NL 手牌所有 batwinsmod:Shoot 牌 batwinsmod:Storage !M! 张 随机 batwinsmod:Bullet .

BATwinsMod:ExpansionMagazine.NAME: 扩容弹夹
BATwinsMod:ExpansionMagazine.DESCRIPTION: 本场战斗 batwinsmod:Storage 的 batwinsmod:Bullet 牌 upgrade .

BATwinsMod:BulletWarehouse.NAME: 武器库
BATwinsMod:BulletWarehouse.DESCRIPTION: 从4张 batwinsmod:Shoot 牌中选择1张加入手牌. NL exhaust
BATwinsMod:BulletWarehouse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 从4张 upgrade 的 batwinsmod:Shoot 牌中选择1张加入手牌. NL exhaust

BATwinsMod:StableShooting.NAME: 稳定射击
BATwinsMod:StableShooting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL 每 batwinsmod:Storage 了一cards伤害提升 !M! .

BATwinsMod:RandomShooting.NAME: 胡乱射击
BATwinsMod:RandomShooting.DESCRIPTION: batwinsmod:Storage !M! 张随机 batwinsmod:Bullet . NL 打出后将 batwinsmod:Storage 的 batwinsmod:Bullet 牌 batwinsmod:Storage 在手牌随机 batwinsmod:Shoot 牌中后清空.

BATwinsMod:FocusShooting.NAME: 集中射击
BATwinsMod:FocusShooting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL  batwinsmod:Storage batwinsmod:Bullet 时再 batwinsmod:Storage !M! 张相同的 batwinsmod:Bullet 牌.打出后清空 batwinsmod:Storage 的 batwinsmod:Bullet .

BATwinsMod:Accelerate.NAME: 加速
BATwinsMod:Accelerate.DESCRIPTION: 选择Draw牌堆 !M! 张耗能低于X的牌打出.
BATwinsMod:Accelerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 选择Draw牌堆 !M! 张耗能低于X+1的牌打出.
